events.message: I received the wrong size for the jacket I ordered, and I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified as a refund request due to the customer's need to return an incorrectly sized jacket.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrectly sized jacket order.
Hello! I’m Jessica, and I’ll assist you with returning your jacket and processing your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused with the tags still attached?
My order number is 75483921. The jacket is unused, and the tags are still on it. I want to send it back quickly.
Thank you for the info. I’ll send you a prepaid return label via email today, and once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund promptly.
Thanks, that sounds great! I appreciate the quick help and look forward to the return instructions.
We have received the returned jacket and issued your refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear on your statement.
Just checking in to confirm you’ve received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since you confirmed receipt of your refund, we are closing this case. Have a great day!
